<font color="#D6494A">**The following schedule reflects workshop times and dates for SIPPS 2022. Information about SIPPS 2023 will be announced later this year.**</font>

<hr>

SIPPS hosts three parallel workshop series, each with one session per week. See below for a detailed overview of all workshop topics and dates, and see the [workshops](/workshops) page for materials associated with each session.

If you miss a workshop and need to access the recording, please reach out to the SIPPS team at please [sippscupsych@gmail.com](mailto:sippscupsych@gmail.com){target="_blank"}.

<br><br>

<p style="text-align:center">
Mondays, 3-5pm
</p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-1"></div>

<p style="text-align:center">
Wednesdays, 3-4pm
</p>
</div>

<p style="text-align:center">
Thursdays, 1-2pm
</p>

appointments by request: email [sippscupsych@gmail.com](mailto:sippscupsych@gmail.com) <br>
(we welcome any questions or concerns, big or small!)
</div></div>

<br><br>

In addition to these workshops, students are expected to work in tandem with their mentor(s) to plan and execute their independent research projects. These projects will then be shared at the <font color="#D6494A"><b>SIPPS mini-conference</b></font> at the end of the program in mid-August.
